text:
After reading and rewriting a document with designed tables (colors and borders), the output file loses the tables and the text format.

The tables were created with Microsoft Office 2010 and even without altering the document, the output is modified.

If there are only simple tables, the output file gets correct, but if there is at least one designed table, the output file loses the tables and the text format.

Follow as attachment, the input document. To generate the output it is only necessary read it and rewrite it without even modifying.
creator: gafsel@gmail.com
vlsergey@gmail.com
text:
Gabriel,

Could you attach the mentioned file, please?

Sergey
